{"blocks":[{"key":"ce4p2","text":"Make up a reporter mix for each coverslip in a light-protected microcentrifuge tube:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dnhp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"675t7","text":"  Reporter Stock Solution (RSS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9hm7k","text":"  each CODEX® barcoded reporter (RX); up to 3 RX (one of each fluorophore) per coverslip","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"618B8A20AC8711ECBC610FC4177AF446","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"634D3750AC8711ECBC610FC4177AF446","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fafb0","text":"Affix a piece of parafilm onto the bench using lab tape. Use a Sharpie to label spaces for each coverslip, then pipet reporter mixes into the corresponding spaces. Using bent-tip tweezers, place each coverslip face-down onto the pooled drop of reporter mix. Cover with a box top or other light-protective structure and incubate for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":210,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":332,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"D4FD5F60AC8711ECBC610FC4177AF446","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fvi0","text":"Establish the efficacy of the primary antibody using an indirect immunofluorescence protocol (e.g., steps 1-20 of Immunofluorescent Staining of Mouse Pancreas).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":44}],"data":{}},{"key":"f4uon","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6m928","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7iltc","text":"ⓘ See also: Antibody Screening and Custom-conjugation - Tips and guidelines (Akoya Biosciences).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":12,"length":63}],"data":{}},{"key":"8phh1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EDF37615AC8811EC82F60A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bzvwp67e"}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":17,"offset":48,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bqau7","text":"Primary antibodies used for conjugation must be free of additives (e.g., BSA, glycerol), so keep this in mind when selecting antibodies to screen. Some manufacturers offer alternate formulations of listed clones or a \"carrier-free\" format. In our experience, a low concentration of sodium azide is permissible.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E38B14C0C3E611ECA8370311D2137099","url":"https://www.akoyabio.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Antibody-Screening-and-Custom-Conjugation.pdf"}}}}
